greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A variant of Recamán's sequence: a(0)=1, a(n) = a(n-1)-(n-1) if positive and new, else a(n) = a(n-1)+(n-1).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
formula: a(n+1) = A005132(n) - 1; A005132 is Recamán's sequence. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Mar 12 2010
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = If[an = a[n-1] - (n-1); an > 0 && FreeQ[Array[a, n-1], an], an, a[n-1] + (n-1)]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 65}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 18 2018 *)
program: f x ys@(y:_) | u > 0 && u `notElem` ys = u : f (x + 1) (u : ys)
where u = y - x; v = x + y
if x > 0 and x not in l:
xref: See A005132, which is the main entry for this sequence. A063753 = 1 + A005132. A row of A066201. Also a row of A066202.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 05 2001
